website_summaries.verdict: With crystal clear lenses and a rugged body, these binoculars give you everything you'd expect from Leupolds in a compact, lightweight package.
pros: Lightweight, small, and high in quality
Rubberized exterior is comfortable to grip
cons: Focus mechanism may be a bit stiff

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Leupold never disappoints. As a Tower Crane Operator of 13 years, a good pair of compact binoculars always remains in the cab with me. The Rogue 10x25 is a perfect fit for my needs. Easy adjustments, clear, sharp, compact, waterproof Performance in low light is good. Easy to stow when not in use. I would proudly recommend these to anyone looking for a fairly priced set of quality, compact binoculars and already have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I spy
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of vintage Zeiss 10x52 binoculars that belonged to my grandfather. Absolutely magnificent piece of work. But they’re big, heavy and expensive. Not the best suited for hiking. So I was looking for something small and lighter but with decent optics. These are exactly what I was looking for. Excellent quality. Very sharp, crisp optics. Light and easy to pack. Quite simple to adjust. I realize that these are not top of the line Leupolds, but for the price I am extremely impressed. Just what I wanted. These are made in the Philippines 🇵🇭 (Hell of a lot better than China 🇨🇳!) Highly recommend Thanks for reading
customer_reviews.author: MooseTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Clearer than the similar Pentax binoculars that these replaced.
customer_reviews.text: I have been duly impressed with the visual quality of these binoculars. I was able to even see deer moving in the fog last week that I could barely see with my bare eyes, and definitely couldn't see at all through my riflescope.
customer_reviews.author: M. Battenfield

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep in my Jeep. I wanted something compact and light weight and these fit the bill. They are easy to focus and have excellent clarity. They also work well if you wear glasses. I like them and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Barnhouse

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for close-range
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use during field surveys of butterflies and they are perfect for that kind of thing, namely getting magnification on a tiny thing at close range. These would also be great for back yard or close range bird viewing (within 100 ft). However, they weren't great for looking at soaring hawks or the eagle that was across a lake from me (~500-700 ft). I really like them and they are perfect for my purposes, but they wouldn't be for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Heddys

customer_reviews.title: Compact not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Not the Leupold clarity I expected and hard to quickly multi adjust for deer hunting. Not a crisp clear view for 10x binoculars. Will stick with my regular size Minolta’s.
customer_reviews.author: W. B.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, My dad got my first pair for a gift. After they got "missing" I got another pair. The only thing I don't like is the adjustable eye piece that screws out for eye relief is easy to break off. This is the only problem I have ever had with these. I use them for hunting in central and eastern NC. The glass is very clear even after years of hunts and travel. Never had a problem with fogging up or water entering them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I’m not happy with these. They are hard to adjust and for the price I thought they would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hiking, Hunting and Sight Seeing!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it’s a Leupold! Really light weight, compact enough to put anywhere and to carrying anywhere too. The rubber gripping makes it perfect for Hiking and Hunting! The visibility is very clear even looking at 500 yards! The focus is really good but about 400 yards it starts to get blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Zaragoza

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, CLEAR as a bell seeing anything far off, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband, and he LOVES them! He's had a large, name-brand pair of binoculars for years, that he swore by. Now, he only uses these! GREAT price, and SO worth seeing him enjoy them like he does?
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my kid as a toy, because I didn’t want platic junk. Now when i tested them, i am jealous :) Very good quality light weight and compact binoculars. They can fit into jackets pocket. Picture is clear and controls are sharp. For the price under hundred dollars it is good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sergiy

customer_reviews.title: Great binoculars at any price
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding view, great magnification. Very clear picture. Small and lightweight. All this for under $100. Outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Beerfish

customer_reviews.title: Quality binoculars for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the quality you expect from Leupold. Glad I bought them. My third item I have bought from Leupold. These did not disappoint. Quality quality quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars never fog up on me or blur. Very clear and compact for carrying around my neck or in my pack. They look great and are compact.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gene Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Like them
customer_reviews.text: I like these although I’m not a fan of the eye cups. They gather light good for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Penguins06

customer_reviews.title: Great bank for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when they were $89, on the Leupold site this go for $140. Glass is clear and they are super lightweight. Definitely great bank for your buck
customer_reviews.author: Ash and Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great set of compact binoculars!
customer_reviews.text: Love this small pair of binoculars and I'm looking forward to using them for domestic trips and when travelling overseas!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome compact binoculars. The optics are flawless!!! Great for hikes, backyard and getting closer to nature.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He really liked it. He said it's really clear
customer_reviews.author: joyce lord

customer_reviews.title: Great first impression
customer_reviews.text: Just got them earlier this week. Came through in fine condition and the image is very sharp for an affordable pair of binoculars. I will know more after taking them into the field, but for now this appears to be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorT

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality. Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent optical equipment. I use them for concerts and bird watching. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Compact and clear sight
customer_reviews.text: Used these binoculars for a retirement trip to Alaska. They were clear, compact and worked well. They were well worth the money we spent on them.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from Leupold. No adjustments to widen the binoculars to align with your eyes. Plastic body. The rear adjustable eye sights were something I’d expect on a set of toy binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: heather mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Good but glad the warranty is lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: Broke the holder for the shoulder strap the second time I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good binocs
customer_reviews.text: These are clear, relatively easy to use and affordable. The right side focus is a bit stiff but to use that as a reason for downgrading is just whining. I mainly use them for birdwatching and closeup viewing of the stage at performances at one of our Albuquerque live venues, Popejoy Performance Center.
customer_reviews.author: Dione Greywolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great Bino. Great price. Can’t mount em though
customer_reviews.text: Love the price and range. Crisp focal. Compact. I wish they could be mountable to a tripod or similar. Glue a GoPro attachment to it I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Nice units
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are really nice . Compact, clear and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: corinne withey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for compact, water/fogproof binoculars for waterfowl hunting. Absolutely perfect. My first Leupold product and I will be buying Leupold again.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a cheap pair of roof prism binocs and all I could say is WOW! The advertised close focus distance is wrong, it's more like 2 feet. Very crisp images and very bright. At dusk, I noticed no dimming of light from plain sight. A little bit bulkier than my old pair of binocs but the other features make up for it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Eng

customer_reviews.title: Never able to Focus
customer_reviews.text: Sorry people this is no worth buying, Never able to Focus, Wife picked them up and said they are blurry enough said.. No I do-not recommend them, unless you need a paper weight, (JUNK)
customer_reviews.author: long time Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leupold BX-1
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a pair that was stolen from my vehicle. Great compact binocs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Porter

customer_reviews.title: As Expected from Leupold.
customer_reviews.text: In order to get the compact binocs as shown in the picture, you need to order the 10x25mm, otherwise it won't be the compact. Easy to focus, amazing image, easy to use, and fit well into a pack. I got them for a B.O.B, and for backpacking, and I so far they've out great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price ! We Bought these for our daughter for Christmas to use for hiking and camping. We have a large farm and these come in handy. The lens’ are clear as expected with Leupold products, even at max range.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Schrimsher

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: My husband says they are too compact, hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set of lenses.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about these. Lightweight, compact, great little set.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey W.

customer_reviews.title: Great binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: Clear and bright. Wouldn't expect less from Leupold. Great binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: bigsmiles

customer_reviews.title: Great quality binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I love these binoculars. They are perdect for my bird watching pasttime. They are comfortable and I can use them with my glasses. They also have a nice crisp view through them. Nothing annoys me more than having binoculars that don't have clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glass!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of binoculars but these are as nice as any and under $100...I would not hesitate to buy these ..they are very sharp and well made.. These are compact enough to put in a pocket
customer_reviews.author: Brunzie

customer_reviews.title: Good binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are small, light and clear. I used them for watching a football game.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I love these binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: These are really great little binoculars. Clear view, lightweight, and handy.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Hynek

customer_reviews.title: MONEY WELL SPENT!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome binoculars. Lets you see up close, as well as far away. Very, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair to replace my Bushnell Legend binocs, which were no longer working due to a long drop. These binoculars look almost identical to the Legends, appear to be very well made, and work well. I would recommend these for hunters. I use binoculars for bow hunting deer using a climbing stand.They are small enough to be out of the way, and light enough to use all day.The optics are great, and the eye pieces are easy to use with or without glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Price

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR TURKEY HUNTIN
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars just the right size to fit in my turkey vest and very light weight and easy to use, the clarity is very good. Great product for price and quality
customer_reviews.author: BOB ROBBINS

customer_reviews.title: Best value glasses around.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of the Leupold Rogue as a gift. They are the best field glasses for the size anywhere! Super clear, light weight, very adjustable and comfortable. Now I need to get myself a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Good Vacation Glasses
customer_reviews.text: This time I wanted to see the dolphins off the coast that everyone else saw and I saw plenty. I also love them for close up of the birds at our feeders and a hawk that sometimes visits our deck.
customer_reviews.author: Edie Manring

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Looking through my old Bushnell's I could see the pine trees, now I see the pine needles! Low light visibility and definition are top notch! Light weight. Lower quality carrying case and neck strap than you'd expect from Leupold. Box says "Made in Philippines"
customer_reviews.author: Troy W. Dreesman

customer_reviews.title: I really like it...
customer_reviews.text: Paid for what I expected although skeptical before arrival : Rugged, Compact, Decent optic quality, Ease of use. By the way, it came with carrying pouch, eye-lens caps, and strap. Delivery was very quick from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Aladdin

customer_reviews.title: Nice binoculars but accesories not up to quality.
customer_reviews.text: Work great for my small face. Case a little too small and strap is very flimsy, otherwise I would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla

customer_reviews.title: Nice binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed to find some Leupold binocs for such a good price! I had a pair that I lost somehow, and it didn't break the bank to replace them. Quality is what you'd expect from Leupold, I have experience with their rifle scopes, and was not dissapointed in these binoculars. The vision is crystal clear, they are easy to focus, and convenient to carry. Small form and ergonomic shape make them comfortable to hold while viewing, and durable casing doesn't make me feel like I am handling a glass slipper. Obviously they aren't super high magnification, but for me that isn't a big problem. For the price, I doubt you will find anything better quality than these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: These are compact and clear as a bell. I keep them in my work truck and help keep an eye on the project. Yes they are not the expensive ones, but they do a good job
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: Good seller and prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Good seller and prompt delivery,would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are small and perfect for my needs. Easy store and carry.
customer_reviews.author: charles Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Clear
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my hands. Clearly the best. Just as advertised. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ( Leupold ) nuff said
customer_reviews.text: I love these, bought for hunting and they do not fog up like many others I have tried, They are very clear and to focus is easy
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great Optics
customer_reviews.text: Leupold products are always awesome. These are nice and compact. Great for games, track meets, and hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great binoculars at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Like: This is my second pair of this binocular and have found the optics very clear at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Shotts

customer_reviews.title: Great Bins, Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these binoculars for a trip to Scotland. I wanted a compact pair and a reasonable price. I knew Leupold made good hunting scopes so I was hoping their binoculars were just as good. I must say, I'm very pleased with these. These are lightweight, compact and waterproof. I forgot and left them outside one night. the next morning they were fogged over with dew. I wiped them off with a towel and once they warmed up, they were totally clear. The image is very sharp, the eye cups twist up and down (great for people with glasses) and they work will for people with smaller features. I do not have anything bad to say.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Louise Doe

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of affordable bionos.
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear optics and a great size/weight to keep in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of binoculars. Clear view, leave them in the truck for whenever. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: jschaefer

customer_reviews.title: BX-1 Rogue Leupold Binocular
customer_reviews.text: This binocular is everything I expected. Needed a quality compact, waterproof model and this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Allan E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love them and just the right size
customer_reviews.text: For the money you can't beat them! Even ended up getting the 10x as well. Love them and just the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Andreoni

customer_reviews.title: Safe Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great set of Binoculars. Good optics at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect size. Small enough to fit in pocket and light weight. Very clear to look through. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Mark Fox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good binoculars I used to min Alaska very clear
customer_reviews.author: twoz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hunting glass
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Compact. Hugs the eyes very well. You can't go wrong for the price! Leupold is great quality glass.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher LeBeau

customer_reviews.title: Nice Enough for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much due to the cost. The aren't very bright as you would imagine but there is a little too much image distortion at the edges than I would expect from something Leupold brand. I do like the positive clicks on the diopter ring but would prefer rubber eye cups over the twist out plastic cups on these. The size is right and the weight is perfect for the hiking day pack. I just cant justify spending several hundred dollars on binoculars so these do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell A.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as gift.
customer_reviews.text: My step dad tells me he loves them! I researched different brands, sizes and styles and would've bought these for myself as well. Good products from Leupold for as long as I've known the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for what I wanted them to do.
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are nice and clear, light, and waterproof. I like the warranty and think they nicely fulfill the job I wanted them to. If I were planning to glass for hours, or go birdwatching, I would prefer a midsized or full-sized, but that is not what I wanted, so compact was ideal.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Alaska and they were perfect. Did a lot of hiking and they were the right weight - not too heavy or bulky. The optics were fine, and I was very glad they were waterproof. Completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: June Carhart

customer_reviews.title: binoculars
customer_reviews.text: came as described. had another pair which i gave to my grandson who does bird watching. easy to use; very good optics; great for use opera or athletic events
customer_reviews.author: john s lutch

customer_reviews.title: Leupold Rogue 8x25 compact porro
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these 8x25's. The clarity is more than I expected. I had a compact pair of Bushnells in 8x25 that I keep in my everyday bag but was not happy with the quality of the glass. The Rogue Compact Porro works great. I find myself reaching for these more than I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: B HAYWARD

customer_reviews.title: Top Rate Optics, High Clarity, Exceptional Visual field
customer_reviews.text: The optics of this small set of binoculars is beyond expectations. Clarity of the down field object is without a doubt the best I have experienced!
customer_reviews.author: Mikeq

customer_reviews.title: pleased
customer_reviews.text: Although this is not the first Leupold product I have purchased over the years, but it was everything I had expected from a Leopold product, expecially considering the cost for this product. I hunt with my other product and this purchase was more for surveilance so it fit the bill. Well worth what I paid. Amazon's service was great as always.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: .Mother's day present.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife to watch birds. I use them to spot small game at ranges up to 200-250 yards. Crystal clear with great focus.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Reno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent binoculors
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are light weight, can focus up close, and even tho they were used they are like new. The only problem is I can't find a decent strap for them.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S. Lamond

customer_reviews.title: - great to see spotters @ 600 yds & for hunting
customer_reviews.text: Soopah Doopah Binoculahs! - great to see spotters @ 600 yds & for hunting!
customer_reviews.author: A New Englandah

customer_reviews.title: Leupold :)
customer_reviews.text: These are compact and beautiful if I had the cash I would order a backup. Sharp, clear, and clean image is all i can say. I'm looking forward to purchasing the Leupold Kenai 30x, 25-60x80mm HD Straight Kit someday soon :)
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to fit in my range bag, strong enough for what I need when I'm zero-ing in my scope and absolutely clear as crystal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good binoc's. Clear vision and comfortable to hold. Two thumbs up !!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on our trip to the Amazon and Macchu Picchu. Highly recommend it . Very easy to focus.
customer_reviews.author: alr

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sharp, light weight binocular for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: They are nice and lightweight. This is a very nice binocular for wildlife viewing. The optics are very sharp. The eye pieces have adjustable eye relief standoffs, which are useful if you don't wear eyeglasses. If you wear eyeglasses, you can adjust the standoffs to be flush with the eyepieces. There are no caps for the objective lenses, but the objective lenses are recessed pretty well, so they are fairly well protected from getting scratched. There are caps for the eyepieces. The neck strap was a little tricky to figure out, but finally got it attached and adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: massasauga

customer_reviews.title: Leupold Rogue -- a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this binocular is very hard to beat. The construction and appearance are well done. However, for my purposes -- hunting I wish it were a bit more compact. But all things considered I am well pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: CSC -Ven.

customer_reviews.title: great optics
customer_reviews.text: These compare favorable to much more expensive binos that I own. These will be used specifically for spring turkey hunting and the size and weight is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: dmc308

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for great quality, crisp lenses
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for great quality, crisp lenses. Thanks Leupold and thanks Amazon , for the speedy shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Greet pair of binoculars
customer_reviews.text: The Leupold Rogue is a great buy. High quality, excellent optics, compact size. I recommend them for someone looking for a pair of binoculars for normal day to day use.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis W. Sterner

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very clear optics and can view close range ss well as distance
customer_reviews.author: Jeffry C

customer_reviews.title: Poor image, difficult to adjust.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if this pair is defective or of poor quality. The clarity is just not there. I can read signs with my $65 Pentax, that I cannot read with these. Two other observers agreed with this finding. Additionally these are difficult to adjust . The controls are generally stiff. The secondary focus ring is located close to a body flare and hard to get to two fingers onto it. It is to stiff to move with one finger.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S

customer_reviews.title: Well Built, Not Totally Sold on Design
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described and pictured. I am not totally sold on the design (I keep pinching the fatty part of my hand when adjusting) but the binoculars do work quite well and are bright and clear.
customer_reviews.author: FireAntFX

customer_reviews.title: Best quality optics for my budget.
customer_reviews.text: I already own one of these little beauties, so it was easy to buy another one. I know I will enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Word Connoisseur

customer_reviews.title: Seems a bit fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: I understand that this is by no means high-end glass, but I got these to replace a pair of Nikon Travellites -- (not waterproof - I won't make that mistake again) -- and they don't seem to focus nearly as well. They just seem fuzzy around the outside edges no matter how much I play with the focus and diopter. Although they are compact and light, they are noticeably heavier than the previous Nikons well. I hope it's all the waterproofing that makes them heavier.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the mother for Christmas and she absolutely loves it! She loves going to the opera and usually can't see the performance that well but with these she is can see everything! I recommend this product to everyone, it is the perfect size and weight (Small and light). I hope this was helpful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the money. expected no less from Leupold. Would have given it five stars had it been just a bit more compact. Cant quite get them in my pocket but they are first class.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Leupold Rogue Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the sharpest binoculars that I have looked through including much more expensive brands. They are also excellent in low light conditions for a compact binocular. I would highly recommend these binoculars. They are relatively compact and light weight. I do a considerable amount of wildlife veiwing and these are perfect for the hunter or just a nice compact handy pair of binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: SMSFLYER

customer_reviews.title: Nice glass for the money
customer_reviews.text: I needed a glass that was waterproof, and not too expensive for use in kayak and canoe. These meet those specifications, are light weight and compact. For their price point I think it is a terrific product. They seem well made and of good quality. While they have not gone "swimming" yet, they have been rain soaked with no problems to report.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Not for big guys
customer_reviews.text: NOTHING against the glass, Leupold makes an excellent product. I just couldn't get the binoculars to spread open wide enough to reach each eye. 6'2" 250lbs 7 3/4 cap size I went with the Leupold Yosemite and am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve 55

customer_reviews.title: Leupold binoculars from warehouse deals.
customer_reviews.text: The Binoculars are terrific. Great price,light weight and fantastic clarity.As a novice with binoculars the focusing directions were really helpful, I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: J. F. Q

customer_reviews.title: What can I say except this is another great Leupold product
customer_reviews.text: What can I say except this is another great Leupold product! I've taken them out a couple times for a little use and have not been let down. the real test comes over the next 6 days on my deer hunting trip. Although I'm sure I won't be let down! Grand slam Leupold!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best I've owned. Light, bright, clear, easy. LEUPOLD says enough
customer_reviews.author: paul sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great binoculars for hunting
customer_reviews.text: Crisp clear vision. Nice and compact. Live up to the Leupold name.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

product_meta.title: Leupold BX-1 Rogue Binocular
feature_bullets: The Rogue Compact Series packs all the full sized features of the Rogue into a palm-sized package
The inverted Porro prism design makes them incredibly small and lightweight, without sacrificing any optical performance
The multi-coated lens system ensures maximum brightness for clarity, contrast, and color fidelity
Designed rugged, waterproof and covered by the Leupold limited lifetime warranty
